titleStmt.title: Travel Journals of Mary E. Petty
titleStmt.author: Mary Ellen Petty

availability.p: This text is freely available provided the text is distributed with the header information provided

sourceDesc.bibl: Travel Journals of Mary E. Petty Edited by Dana LeTriece Calhoun. ? : Pittsburgh, 2019

listPerson.person:
Calhoun Dana LeTriece Principal Editor Founding Editor
<note type="bio> Dana LeTriece Calhoun is a third-year PhD Student at the University of Pittsburgh in the Rhetoric and Composition Program. LeTriece's area of focus is digital black rhetoric and writing, with a special interest in digital language use and how it relates to space, race, and memory. LeTriece is the great-granddaughter of the subject of this document, Mary Ellen Petty.
